channel.title: Weird 9/11 facts
channel.description:
try this and b amazed and if ur not completely satisfied ill let u punch cameron garret in the face ok so try it
A THIS I S NO JOLE U SHOULD READ ALL THE WAY THROUGH BUT IF NOT AT LEAST READ THE END! WHERE IT SAY OPEN UP WORD.
1) New York City has 11 letters
2) Afghanistan has 11 letters.
3) Ramsin Yuseb (The terrorist who threatened to destroy the Twin Towers in 1993) has 11 letters.
4) George W Bush has 11 letters.
5) The two twin towers make an "11"
This could be a mere coincidence, but this gets more interesting:
1) New York is the 11th state.
2) The first plane crashing against the Twin Towers was flight number
11.
3) Flight 11 was carrying 92 passengers. 9 + 2 = 11
4) Flight 77 which also hit Twin Towers, was carrying 65 passengers.
6+5 = 11
5) The tragedy was on September 11, or 9/11 as it is now known. 9 + 1+ 1 = 11
6) The date is equal to the US emergency services telephone number 911.
9 + 1 + 1 = 11.
Sheer coincidence..?! Read on and make up your own mind: 1) The total number of victims inside all the hi-jacked planes was 254. >2 + 5 + 4 = 11.
2) September 11 is day number 254 of the calendar year.
Again 2 + 5 + 4 = 11.
3) The Madrid bombing took place on 3/11/2004. 3 + 1 + 1 + 2 + 4 = 11.
4) The tragedy of Madrid happened 911 days after the Twin Towers incident.
Sheer coincidence..?! Read on and make up your own mind: Now this is where things get totally eerie:
The most recognised symbol for the US, after the Stars & Stripes, is the Eagle. The following verse is taken from the Quran, the Islamic holy book:
"For it is written that a son of Arabia would awaken a fearsome Eagle. The wrath of the Eagle would be felt throughout the lands of Allah and lo, while some of the people trembled in despair still more rejoiced: for the wrath of the Eagle cleansed the lands of Allah and there was peace."
That verse is number 9.11 of the Quran.
Still uncovinced about all of this..?! Try this and see how you feel afterwards, it made my hair stand on end:
Open Microsoft Word and do the following(TRY THIS FOR REAL)
1. Type in capitals Q33 NY. This is the flight number of the first
plane to hit one of the Twin Towers.
2. Highlight the Q33 NY
3. Change the font size to 48.
4. Change the actual font to the WINGDINGS 1
scary huh??
NOW REPOST THIS WITHIN 911 SECONDS WITH THE TITLE "Weird 9/11 facts " OR YOUR FAMILY'S NEXT PLANE TRIP WILL BE SHORTER THAN EXPECTED
the microsoft word thing really works so do it, if u do it u would be so freaked out
The end with the font is real,u have to try it!!!!!!!!!!!! Seriously, I never post bulletins but this one is worth it! do it _________ this was origionally made by taylor, but its a pretty cool thing. try it.

[quote=“popcorn89, post:25, topic:49111”]xCrackingx has 10 letters. You have two stars, and gay has three letters in it.

10 + 2 - 3 = 9
10 + 3 - 2 = 11

Coincidence? I think not.[/quote]

rolf!

item.title: Weird 9/11 facts
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

@PaulT I believe the official explanation for World Trade Center seven collapsing was a gas rupture in the basment caused by the neighboring shock wave (the planes crashing into the towers.)

Well, I guess the officials disagree with the owner of WTC7, who said on TV that they had pulled the building.
http://www.prisonplanet.com/011904wtc7.html

Because although the so called "facts" may not be 100% it still gets the point acrossed that something besides a simple minded terrorist attack occurred that day.

Here are theories backed up by fact:
http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-5236492071990669218&q=9%2F11+coincidence+theory&hl=en
http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-8526790279017094192&q=David+Ray+Griffin

Here are facts:
http://www.serendipity.li/wot/571-page-lie.htm
http://www.911truth.org/article.php?story=20041221155307646

Read full topic

item.title: Weird 9/11 facts
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

More Weird 9/11 Facts

~Molten metal found up to six months after 9/11, at the site of the WTC collapse, is consistent with explosives like thermite.
~No skyscraper has ever collapsed from a fire.
~The twin towers fell at near free-fall speed, defied the basic laws of physics, and desintegrated mainly into powder within their own footprints.

Everyone watch "Loose Change". Although all the "facts" are not really 100% true, it still raises stunning points/opinions/facts that can't be ignored.

http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-8526790279017094192&q=David+Ray+Griffin

http://wtc7.net/articles/stevenjones_b7.html

Ah I saw a website disproving many of those facts there. Too lazy to find it.

Fascist whore.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird 9/11 facts
item.dc:creator: @Gorlackgoo Gorlackgoo
item.description:
@Gorlackgoo wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:6, topic:49111”]Weird 9/11 Facts:

~George Bush Sr. was meeting with Osama Bin Ladens brother on 9/11.
~WTC building seven was demolished, not knocked down by an aircraft.
~Some of the hijackers are still alive.
~There were numerous wargames/exercises planned on/near 9/11 by the US government.
~The universal failure of the US aviation authorities, the pentagons air defense system, and the US intelligence service, all happened at the same time.
~Most Bush administration officials were involved heavily in firms (Bechtel, Haliburton, etc…) that profited heavily from US policy changes after 9/11.[/quote]
You’re too leet, sir. But you like Anti-Flag, so that would decrease your leetness by 10%. But you’re still leet man.
